title: 28th September to 1st October 2015) The International Conference on WAQAF, TRUST AND ENDOWMENT in ...
text: ( Source : Universiti Islam Antarabangsa Malaysia ) Academics and practitioners around the world gathered in Moscow , for the International Conference on Waqaf, Trust and Endowment . From September 28th - October 1st 2015 , this conference
